alert.note: Alert for Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:58PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Washington County through 700 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Tibbie, or 10 miles southeast of Chatom, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chatom and Tibbie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
